author: ejcmoorhouse
title: it was also in UK
review:
i am in the UK and i got this at my local McDonalds in the happy meal.
it is a good idea but isn't intresting, it is one of thoses things you play with while eating and never agian.
but because it's lego you can use it in other models which is where it is i think McDonalds should do more free lego sets.
But that would mean i would have to leave the chicken legend with cool mayo:( and go back to happy meals but for lego if it had a minifig then i would do it! ;)
